    • Method Detail

      • markReviewed

        public static void markReviewed(java.lang.String machine,
                java.lang.Long start,
                java.lang.Long end,
                java.lang.String username)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Mark a machine/start/end as reviewed.
        Parameters:
        machine - Machine name
        start - Start time in ms from epoch
        end - End time in ms from epoch
        username - User marking the review
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when the audit review log isn't writeable

      • getAuditLogs

        public static DataResult getAuditLogs(java.lang.String[] types,
                      java.lang.String machine,
                      java.lang.Long start,
                      java.lang.Long end)
        Retrieve the audits for a machine, possibly filtering by types and time
        Parameters:
        types - The types to look for (e.g. "DAEMON_START"); can be null
        machine - The machine name
        start - The start time; can be null
        end - The end time; can be null
        Returns:
        The set of matching audit logs

      • getAuditTypeMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> getAuditTypeMap()
        Return the various audit type-mappings we have defined
        Returns:
        A mapping between the set name and the audit types

        Get the time for the first unreviewed log for the specified machine
        Parameters:
        machineName - The machine to find review times for
        Returns:
        An AuditReviewDto for the machine's first unreviewed section

        machineName - The machine to find review times for

      • getReviewInfo

        public static AuditReviewDto getReviewInfo(java.lang.String machine,
                           long start,
                           long end)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieve the review info for a specified machine/time
        Parameters:
        machine - The machine name
        start - The start time in ms from the epoch
        end - The end time in ms from the epoch
        Returns:
        An AuditReviewDto, possibly with review info set
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws when the audit review file is unreadable
